21  protected function storeContent($key, $content, $tag) {
22  parent::storeContent ( $key, $content, $tag );
23  $apcK = $this->getApcKey ( $key );
24  if (apcu_exists ( $apcK )) {
25  apcu_delete ( $apcK );

29  protected function apcDelete($key) {
30  $apcK = $this->getApcKey ( $key );
31  if (apcu_exists ( $apcK )) {
32  return apcu_delete ( $apcK );
33  }
34  return false;
35  }
36 
37  protected function getApcKey($key) {
38  return md5 ( $this->_root . $key );
39  }
40 
46  public function fetch($key) {
47  $apcK = $this->getApcKey ( $key );
48  if (apcu_exists ( $apcK )) {
49  return apcu_fetch ( $apcK );
50  }
51  $content = parent::fetch ( $key );
52  apcu_store ( $apcK, $content );
53  return $content;
54  }
55 
61  public function remove($key) {
62  $this->apcDelete ( $key );
63  return parent::remove ( $key );
64  }
65 }
